events.name: WordPress Meetup (June 2015)
events.description: It's time for another meetup! The WordPress Singapore meetup aims to bring together people of all skill levels, from beginners to people who have been using WordPress since it was first released in 2003 (woah!). Programme: • "Running WordPress on Amazon Web Services" by Chris Hampartsoumian • "Scaling Tech in Asia" by Lester Chan • "In Page SEO" by Suren Dias • Open space discussion We're looking for speakers and volunteers to help organise our meetups! Please contact Valentine or Jon if you're interested in helping out. Feel free to also RSVP on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/events/866475686753531/ Venue sponsor: Amazon Web Services (Thanks guys!) Address: Amazon Web Services Level 10 23 Church Street Capital Square Singapore[masked]
events.location: Amazon Web Services Office, Level 10, 23 Church Street, Singapore
